entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 01:34 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 01:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 01:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 01:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
